cast.overview: Frank is an expert professional safecracker, specialized in high-profile diamond heists. He plans to use his ill-gotten income to retire from crime and build a nice life for himself complete with a home, wife and kids. To accelerate the process, he signs on with a top gangster for a big score.
cast.title: Thief

crew.overview: Frank is an expert professional safecracker, specialized in high-profile diamond heists. He plans to use his ill-gotten income to retire from crime and build a nice life for himself complete with a home, wife and kids. crew.title: Thief

details.biography: John Santucci was born on November 8, 1940 as John Louis Schiavone. He is known for his work on Crime Story (1986), Thief (1981) and Miami Vice (1984). He died on February 22, 2004 in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
details.name: John Santucci
